name: Tetsuya Sakurai
content: Mathematical Modeling & Algorithms Â Â Â Â Â Publications: Google Scholar Citations Award: Commendation for Science and Technology by the Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology 2018 Â Tetsuya Sakurai Executive Research Director, Center for Artificial Intelligence Research (C-AIR) Professor, Department of Computer Science University of Tsukuba Research Field: Artificial Intelligence(AI), Machine Learning, Mathematical Algorithms, Data Science Research Topics: Latent Space Analysis Privacy Enhanced AI Algorithms Algorithms for deep neural networks (DNNs) Parallel algorithms for large-scale eigenvalue problems AI Applications: Medical and Healthcare, Material, Smart Factory, Smart City Â Â
